name: Environaut\Checks\Check
short_desc: Class that custom Checks may extend to get access to the dialog helper from the command (and thus the input/output stream).

__construct.name: __construct
__construct.short_desc: Creates a new Check instance with a random name and the default group.

getResult.name: getResult
getResult.short_desc: Returns the result of this check.
getResult.long_desc: This should be called after the run() method has been run.

setName.name: setName
setName.short_desc: Sets the name of the check.
setName.long_desc: When null or a non-string value is given a random name is set.
setName.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

getName.name: getName
getName.short_desc: Returns the name of this check.

setGroup.name: setGroup
setGroup.short_desc: Sets the group name of the check (for reports).
setGroup.long_desc: Null or non-string values will set the default group name.
setGroup.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

group.name: group
group.short_desc: name of the group the check belongs to

getGroup.name: getGroup
getGroup.short_desc: Returns the group name of this check that may be useful to group/namespace settings.

setParameters.name: setParameters
setParameters.short_desc: Sets the necessary runtime parameters of the check.
setParameters.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.short_desc: runtime configuration parameters for this check

getParameters.name: getParameters
getParameters.short_desc: Returns the runtime parameters that are used to run this check.

setCache.name: setCache
setCache.short_desc: Sets the cache instance a check may use to retrieve old values from the cache to prevent e.g.
setCache.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

getDependencies.name: getDependencies
getDependencies.short_desc: Returns the tokens that should be available prior to running this check.

getDefaultGroupName.name: getDefaultGroupName
getDefaultGroupName.short_desc: Returns the default group name this check uses when none is specified.
getDefaultGroupName.hint_desc: default group name of the check

getDefaultSettingGroupName.name: getDefaultSettingGroupName
getDefaultSettingGroupName.short_desc: Returns the default group name this check uses for settings when none is specified.
getDefaultSettingGroupName.hint_desc: default group name of settings of this check

setCommand.name: setCommand
setCommand.hint_desc: this instance for fluent API support

getRandomString.name: getRandomString
getRandomString.short_desc: Returns a random string with the specified length and prefix (prefix is not part of the length).
